comments: Somerstein is flighty, confusing, and repetative. She gives out pretty useless "busy-work" and is very hard to talk to. Though assigned to a class that is created to help freshmen out, she is totally useless!
She z grreat teacher.Down to earth, fair grader,knowledgable.She will not bust your ass. If u work hard, you will get an A

I think she z great.She is a fair garder.I recomment any one to take her class. She is not like any other professor.She is very reasonable and bright.She knows how to teach and she explains every single stuff. Let me tell you. You can participate in the class and get a gud grade.She z down to earth. Take her. It z a gud class.
